summary: This is an announcement providing additional information regarding a proposed private placement. It clarifies the utilization of proceeds based on minimum and maximum scenarios, detailing allocations for the acquisition of PMSB and working capital.

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Fully fund the Acquisition of 30% equity interest in Propel Maxflo Sdn Bhd (PMSB).
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.amount: RM2.982 million (minimum scenario), RM4.408 million (maximum scenario)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: For the Group's oil and gas services segment and renewable energy activities.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Estimated expenses for the Proposed Private Placement
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Professional fees, regulatory fees, and contingencies.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Upon completion of the Proposed Private Placement
